Plot: A scientific expedition sets out for Borneo to seek a flower called the Blood Orchid, which could grant longer life. Meanwhile, they run afoul of snakes and each other.
Title: Anacondas: The Hunt for the Blood Orchid
Writer: Hans Bauer, Jim Cash, Jack Epps Jr., Hans Bauer (story), Jim Cash (story), Jack Epps Jr. (story), John Claflin (screenplay), Daniel Zelman (screenplay), Michael Miner (screenplay), Edward Neumeier (screenplay)
Actors: Johnny Messner, KaDee Strickland, Matthew Marsden, Nicholas Gonzalez
